top.title: Trump's plan for Gaza backed by UN Security Council
top.summary: Included in the 20-point peace plan is the establishment of an International Stabilisation Force (ISF), which would work to demilitarise the territory.

top.title: A Chinese firm bought an insurer for CIA agents - part of Beijing's trillion dollar spending spree
top.summary: When an insurer for FBI and CIA agents was sold to a Chinese entity, it led the US to tighten investment laws.

top.title: US judge says government 'missteps' may have tainted Comey case
top.summary: The former FBI director is facing federal charges after Donald Trump called for his prosecution.

top.title: Google boss warns 'no company is going to be immune' if AI bubble bursts
top.summary: The AI boom has been an "extraordinary moment" but a subsequent bust would affect every company, CEO Sundar Pichai told the BBC.

top.title: Don't blindly trust what AI tells you, says Google's Sundar Pichai
top.summary: Sundar Pichai candidly acknowledged concerns about inaccurate answers generated by Google's models.

top.title: British hacker must repay £4m after hijacking celebrity Twitter accounts
top.summary: Joseph O'Connor, from Liverpool, hacked more than 130 accounts in July 2020 to promote a Bitcoin scam.
